entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
